sources.name: csv_clientes
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  csv_clientes

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared csv_clientes = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://blobstoragerjz.blob.core.windows.net/input/clientes.txt"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv])
in
  Csv;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = csv_clientes,
  #"Columna condicional insertada" = Table.AddColumn(Source, "type_desc", each if [Column3] = "1" then "Tipo 1" else if [Column3] = "2" then "Tipo 2" else "")
in
  #"Columna condicional insertada";
